title: Senate Homeland Security Counsel Quietly Settled With Justice Department Over Conflict of Interest Claim
description:
Michelle Benecke will pay $50,000 to settle a conflict of interest claim related to awarding a DHS contract to a predecessor’s company.

The post Senate Homeland Security Counsel Quietly Settled With Justice Department Over Conflict of Interest Claim appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Hunger Striker vs. The Dictator
description:
The hunger strike of Egypt’s Alaa Abd El Fattah overshadows COP27 and Sisi’s attempt to whitewash his regime’s human rights record.

The post The Hunger Striker vs. The Dictator appeared first on The Intercept.
